name: Abby's Wacky Watch
description:
Abby manages to somehow end up in space where she find a watch that let's her teleport! Create phantoms at will and rewind back to them whenever needed. Show your mastery of all 21 stages by getting A ranks in all of them. (There's no secret though, it's just for your own satisfaction)

Controls:

Z to jump. Z+Down to drop down from Slim platforms
X to pickup items or press buttons. When an item is held, use X again to throw it or X+Down to drop it directly on the ground.
C to create phantoms and C again to reset back to them. Down+C makes you retrieve phantoms without using up your watch's charge.
Enter to pause game

This is just for review; you should know these if you played the tutorial.

Song List:
Title Screen and cutscenes: Yakuza 0 - Substories track
Level Select: Yggdra Union - To the Battlefield
Tutorial: Mario Galaxy - Hint Tv
Space Lab: Paper Mario 64 - A City in the Stars
Icy Mountains: Glover - Prehistoric 1
Mabo Forest: Mischief Makers - Esperance 1
Kilex Factory: Banjo Tooie - Inside Grunty Industries
Pause: Banjo Tooie - Pause
A rank: Smash Melee - Stage Cleared 2
B rank: Smash Melee - Stage Cleared 1
C rank: Jak 3 - Item get
End Screen: Kirby Air Ride - Results Screen
